Name: LYNE
About the game: Deceptively simple. Infinitely complex. LYNE is a minimalist puzzle game that will knot your brain as it calms your soul. Connect the shapes. Fill the board. Lose yourself in the interflowing paths of LYNE. Features Hundreds of pre-built puzzles An infinite number of procedurally-generated puzzles, released daily Slick, intuitive interface Soothing dynamic audio Unlockable colour palettes Multiple languages supported
Meta Title: LYNE: Mar 17, 2014, Thomas Bowker and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on LYNE? Check out the release date (Mar 17, 2014), developer insights from Thomas Bowker, and a complete game summary.
